text: Hey!
We are finally back here Gloria, aren't we?
Yeah! After all these years, Brian.
It's my good old Golden Bay City. Much like I remember it.
Don't you mean much like WE both remember it?
We did meet on this very street, you know?
Can't say much about that.
You know what the bars around here do to my memory.
Yeah, that's true.
We are married after all.
Alright, let's go down on Shaker St. then.
Let's get some icecream or something.
Hey Dido! Stop that boy!
Whose car is that anyway?
Woof-woof! [uncaring]
That's my car you moron!
Get that mutt off my tires. NOW!
Wow! Take it easy buddy. He means no harm.
Well, well, well! Look what the cat dragged in.
Little Brian and a hottie!
You wanna have some fun with a real gentleman, luv?
Sure thing, creep.
Where is he?
Back off, Arkian!
The old days are over. You have no place on these streets any more.
Are they over, Brian?
I'll show your hottie a good time while you ponder on that.
Get them, boys!
